title: Reliability-Based Ensemble Learning: Intermediate Managerial Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental machine learning concepts, classification algorithms understanding, and basic Python
context.additional_context: Practitioner training emphasizing trust-based classification model applications in high-risk decision-making environments

learning_goals: A confidence-based prediction model for binary classification problems can be built using an ensemble learning structure.
Confidence-based classification can be performed without threshold setting by applying the Two-stage One-Class Classifier technique.
Model performance and reliability can be quantitatively evaluated using medical data (e.g., heart disease/diabetes).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
